wikipedia_page.main: Philip Smith VC (1829 – 16 January 1906) was an Irish recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: *Philip Smith (VC) (1829–1906), Irish recipient of the Victoria Cross
